imp.core.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.observer.AbstractSubject
      • imp.core.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject

    public class Model
extends AbstractSubject
    Represents an IMP model.
    Version:
    1.23

    • Method Detail

      • addBody

        public Body addBody(java.lang.String bodyName)
             throws NameConflictException,
                    NullParameterException,
                    InvalidParameterException
        Locate the Body with the given name within the model and return it. -- OR -- If no Body is found with the given name, create it and add it to the model.
        Parameters:
        bodyName - Name of the Body.
        Returns:
        The Body object with the specified name.
        Throws:
        NameConflictException - Thrown if this method attempts to add a body that already exists.
        NullParameterException - If the body name is null.
        InvalidParameterException - thrown if the body name is empty.

      • addJoint

        public void addJoint(Joint theJoint,
            java.lang.String bodyNameAfter,
            java.lang.String bodyNameBefore)
              throws SelfLoopException,
                     NameConflictException,
                     NullParameterException,
                     JointNotFoundException,
                     InvalidParameterException
        Add a joint of a specific type and perhaps bodies to the model.
        Parameters:
        theJoint - The joint to add.
        bodyNameAfter - Name of the body following the joint.
        bodyNameBefore - Name of the body preceding the joint.
        Throws:
        SelfLoopException - Thrown if the joint attempts to connect a body to itself.
        NameConflictException - Thrown if a joint of this name already exists.
        NullParameterException - thrown if any parameters are null.
        JointNotFoundException - Thrown if a joint is removed but cannot be found.
        InvalidParameterException - thrown if the body names are empty.

      • closeLoops

        public void closeLoops(java.util.List<LoopVariable> vars)
                throws LoopException
        Closes the loops in this model for the given joint.
        Parameters:
        vars - the loop variables used for loop closure.
        Throws:
        LoopException - thrown if an error is encountered during loop closure.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.Object classType)
                 throws InvalidDatatypeException
        Determines if a certain element of a specific type exists in the model.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the element being searched for.
        classType - The class type of the element being searched for.
        Returns:
        returns True if it exists, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        InvalidDatatypeException - Thrown if the object is of the wrong class.

      • countBodies

        public int countBodies()
        Get the number of bodies in this model.
        Returns:
        The number of bodies in this model.

      • countJoints

        public int countJoints()
        Get the number of joints in this model.
        Returns:
        The number of joints in this model.

      • findKinematicLoops

        public java.util.List<Loop> findKinematicLoops()
                                        throws LoopException,
                                               BodyNotFoundException
        This method finds all kinematic loops for the current model.
        Returns:
        A list of loop objects.
        Throws:
        LoopException - thrown if an error is encountered during loop finding.
        BodyNotFoundException - Thrown when a body is not found.

      • getBody

        public Body getBody(java.lang.String bodyName)
        Gets the body with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        bodyName - The name of the body to get.
        Returns:
        The body with the specified name.

      • getBodyStructure

        public ElementMap<Body> getBodyStructure()
        Gets a map of the bodies in this model.
        Returns:
        A map containing all bodies in the model.

      • getGround

        public Body getGround()
               throws BodyNotFoundException
        Gets the ground for this model.
        Returns:
        The ground.
        Throws:
        BodyNotFoundException - Thrown if the ground hasn't been set.

      • getJoint

        public Joint getJoint(java.lang.String jointName)
        Gets the joint with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        jointName - The name of the joint to get.
        Returns:
        The joint with the specified name.

      • getJointStructure

        public ElementMap<Joint> getJointStructure()
        Gets a map containing all joints in the model.
        Returns:
        A map containing all joints in the model.

      • getPrintStream

        public java.io.PrintStream getPrintStream()
        Method for returning the print stream used for displaying messages.
        Returns:
        The print stream utilized by the model.

      • removeJoint

        public void removeJoint(java.lang.String jointName)
                 throws JointNotFoundException
        Removes the joint from the model.
        Parameters:
        jointName - The joint to remove.
        Throws:
        JointNotFoundException - Thrown if a joint by the specified name cannot be found.

      • setGround

        public void setGround(java.lang.String groundName)
               throws BodyNotFoundException,
                      InvalidDatatypeException,
                      NameConflictException,
                      NullParameterException,
                      InvalidParameterException
        Method for setting the ground body.
        Parameters:
        groundName - The name of the body to become the ground body.
        Throws:
        BodyNotFoundException - thrown if the body does not exist in this model.
        InvalidDatatypeException - Thrown if the groundName is the name of a joint instead of the name of a body.
        NameConflictException - Thrown if the body doesn't exist, but something exists with the same name.
        NullParameterException - Thrown if the name is null.
        InvalidParameterException - thrown if the ground name is empty.

      • getLoops

        public java.util.List<Loop> getLoops()
        Gets the loops.
        Returns:
        the loops

      • evaluateExpressions

        public void evaluateExpressions()
                         throws WrappedException,
                                MethodReturnValue
        Evaluate expressions.
        Throws:
        WrappedException - the wrapped exception
        MethodReturnValue - the method return value

      • tick

        public void tick()
          throws WrappedException,
                 MethodReturnValue,
                 LoopException
        Move forward a single tick
        Throws:
        MethodReturnValue - a function expression's method returned the wrong value type.
        WrappedException - an unknown exception occurred.
        LoopException - an exception has occurred during loop finding.
